title: Maybelline Dream Mousse Eye Shadow, Ivory Illusion #10.
description: This is such a quick and easy way to apply eye shadow as you don't need a brush or a sponge, apply your favourite shades with your fingertips.The mousse formulation gives amazing blendability and buildability that wears like a powder but applies like a cream.
